name: Awara Paagal Deewana
summary_text: A dentist's life turns into a roller coaster ride when he is unknowingly embroiled in gang wars.

name: Nevada Smith
summary_text: A half-American Indian and half-white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

name: Dead or Alive
summary_text: A yakuza of Chinese descent and a Japanese cop each wage their own war against the Japanese mafia. But they are destined to meet. Their encounter will change the world.

name: The Prince and the Showgirl
summary_text: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

name: Jour de Fête
summary_text: Once a year the fair comes for one day to the little town 'Sainte-Severe-sur-Indre.' All inhabitants are scoffing at François, the postman, what he seems not to recognize. The rising of the...                See full summary »

name: Sweet Country
summary_text: Australian western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

name: 14 Blades
summary_text: A kung fu thriller set during the Ming Dynasty and centered on a secret service agent (Donnie Yen) in the emperor's court who is betrayed and then hunted by his colleagues.

name: Silent Night
summary_text: The police force of a remote Midwestern town search for a killer Santa Claus who is picking off citizens on Christmas Eve.

name: From Beginning to End
summary_text: Two brothers develop a very close relationship as they are growing up in an idyllic and happy family. When they are young adults their relationship becomes very intimate, romantic, and sexual.

name: Dinner at Eight
summary_text: Affluent Millicent and Oliver Jordan throw a dinner for a handful of wealthy and/or well-born acquaintances, each of whom has much to reveal.

name: Albino Alligator
summary_text: While escaping from a foiled robbery attempt, three thieves find themselves surrounded by police at a New Orleans bar--only they're not the people the police are searching for.

name: Zamani barayé masti asbha
summary_text: Young Iranian Kurdish siblings try to save the youngest of them, who is seriously ill.

name: Largo Winch II
summary_text: Largo Winch, the newly appointed CEO of the W Group, is accused of crimes against humanity on the very day he announces his intention to sell his corporation and use the proceeds to create a humanitarian foundation.

name: Lonesome Jim
summary_text: Failing to make it on his own, twenty-seven-year-old Jim moves back in with his parents and deals with crippling family obligations.

name: Dorm Daze
summary_text: Set during a crazy afternoon in the lives of a dozen college students at a co-ed dorm that starts with the arrival of two very different women with the same name of Dominique.

name: Halloweentown II: Kalabar's Revenge
summary_text: A young witch and her grandmother work together to foil the plans of a wicked warlock's son before he can use powerful spells to create chaos in the world.

name: Mogambo
summary_text: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

name: Madea's Big Happy Family
summary_text: The crazy and comical Mabel Simmons, otherwise known as Madea, tries to wrangle her fighting family together for a family dinner regarding the health of her niece Shirley.

name: The Cremator
summary_text: Set in Central Europe during World War II, a demented cremator believes cremation relieves earthly suffering and sets out to save the world.

name: The Out of Towners
summary_text: An Ohio sales executive accepts a higher position within the company and travels to New York City with his wife for his job interview but things go wrong from the start.

name: The House on Sorority Row
summary_text: After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

name: The Associate
summary_text: A comedy about making it on Wall Street. Prejudices are hard to break and Laurel Ayres quickly learns that in order for people to take her seriously she has to work for an older white man or be one.

name: Wilbur Wants to Kill Himself
summary_text: The chronically suicidal Wilbur and his good-hearted big brother Harbour are in their thirties, when their father dies, leaving them with nothing but a worn down second-hand bookshop in Glasgow.

name: Reign of Assassins
summary_text: Drizzle/Zeng Jing tries to start a new life after she had betrayed her gang and hid the remains of monk.

name: Bellflower
summary_text: Two friends spend all their free time building flame-throwers and weapons of mass destruction in hopes that a global apocalypse will occur and clear the runway for their imaginary gang "Mother Medusa".

name: Khiladi
summary_text: Two friends wage bets for money and fun. There comes a time where they race to win the biggest bet, for they know that their lives depend on it.

name: Ben & Arthur
summary_text: A pair of recently married gay men are threatened by one of the partner's brother, a religious fanatic who plots to murder them after being ostracized by his church.

name: The Leisure Seeker
summary_text: A runaway couple go on an unforgettable journey in the faithful old RV they call "The Leisure Seeker".

name: Tad: The Lost Explorer
summary_text: Construction worker Tad wants to be a famous archaeologist. He gets a chance to look for a lost Inca city in Peru, where the gold was hidden. He meets the professor's cute daughter/assistant. Villains chase them.

name: Flower
summary_text: A sexually curious teen forms an unorthodox kinship with her mentally unstable stepbrother.

name: Bye Bye Birdie
summary_text: A rock singer travels to a small Ohio town to make his "farewell" television performance and kiss his biggest fan before he is drafted.

name: Pride and Prejudice
summary_text: The arrival of wealthy bachelors in town causes an uproar when families with single daughters aggressively seek engagements, including the Bennet family, with five eligible daughters.

name: Hababam Sinifi Üç Buçuk
summary_text: Hababam Sinifi returns to the nest finished his military service.

name: The Crowd
summary_text: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles and downfalls.

name: Waiting for the Barbarians
summary_text: At an isolated frontier outpost, a colonial magistrate suffers a crisis of conscience when an army colonel arrives looking to interrogate the locals about an impending uprising, using cruel tactics that horrify the magistrate.

name: Puli
summary_text: A virtuous soldier tries to save people from an evil queen and a throne-seeking commander.

name: A Patch of Blue
summary_text: A blind, uneducated white girl is befriended by a black man, who becomes determined to help her escape her impoverished and abusive home life by introducing her to the outside world.

name: Shi yue wei cheng
summary_text: In 1905, revolutionist Sun Yat-Sen visits Hong Kong to discuss plans with Tongmenghui members to overthrow the Qing dynasty. But when they find out that assassins have been sent to kill him, they assemble a group of protectors to prevent any attacks.

name: I Hate Luv Storys
summary_text: Jay doesn't believe in love Stories, and Simran, is a girl who's in love with the idea of Love itself.

name: Hükümet Kadin
summary_text: One day Midyat's Mayor loses his life in a car accident. His wife Xate must do his job.

name: Samsara
summary_text: A spiritual love-story set in the majestic landscape of Ladakh, Himalayas. Samsara is a quest; one man's struggle to find spiritual Enlightenment by renouncing the world. And one woman's ...                See full summary »

name: Paisan
summary_text: The language barrier has tragic consequences in a series of unrelated stories set during the Italian Campaign of WWII.

name: The Reflecting Skin
summary_text: In the 1950's, a young boy living with his troublesome family in rural USA fantasizes that a neighboring widow is actually a vampire, responsible for a number of disappearances in the area.

name: Samurai Cop
summary_text: Joe Marshall and Frank Washington are two tenacious police detectives who seek at all costs to stop the Katana, a renegade Yakuza gang composed of violent and sadistic killers who want to lead the drug trade in Los Angeles.

name: Undercover Blues
summary_text: A spy couple on maternity leave in New Orleans, entertained by a mugger named Muerte, is called in when Novacek steals explosives.

name: Sleepaway Camp III: Teenage Wasteland
summary_text: After murdering a young girl, Angela Baker assumes her identity and travels to Camp New Horizons, built on the grounds of the camp she terrorized the year before, and starts killing again.

name: Banana Joe
summary_text: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.

name: Palmetto
summary_text: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

name: Tenderness
summary_text: A policeman works to figure out whether a violent teen murdered his family.

name: White Palace
summary_text: Lust turns to love for a 40-ish working-class woman and a 20-ish yuppie adman with little in common.

name: Mr. Jones
summary_text: A Welsh journalist breaks the news in the western media of the famine in Ukraine in the early 1930s.

name: The Gathering
summary_text: Amnesiac Cassie Grant has a premonition that someone or something wants the family that's helping her recover dead. She investigates the secrets of the town they live in and uncovers darkness, both human and supernatural.

name: Max Keeble's Big Move
summary_text: Max Keeble, the victim of his 7th grade class, plots revenge when he learns he's moving; it backfires when he doesn't move after all.

name: Virgin Territory
summary_text: Young Florentines take refuge from the black plague and engage in bawdy adventures and lusty exchanges.

name: Valley of the Dolls
summary_text: Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young women in show business.

name: Chaar Sahibzaade
summary_text: The sacrifices of the four sons of Guru Gobind Singh ji (tenth guru of Sikhs) - Baba Ajit Singh ji, Baba Jujhar Singh ji, Baba Zorawar Singh ji and Baba Fateh Singh ji.

name: Breakfast of Champions
summary_text: A rich car dealer is losing his mind. His son lives in the bomb shelter. His suicidal wife has an affair with his transvestite sales manager.

name: Satan's Slaves
summary_text: After dying from a strange illness that she suffered for 3 years, a mother returns home to pick up her children.

name: French Fried Vacation 2
summary_text: Eight tourists who met in a holiday camp on the Ivory Coast are reunited for a skiing holiday.

name: El Camino Christmas
summary_text: Eric comes to El Camino looking for his unknown dad. He's harassed, hit and jailed by a drunk local cop, who later shoots at a liquor mart with Eric +4 inside. The sheriff and deputy then shoot up the place, answering each other's fire.

name: The Talk of the Town
summary_text: An escaped prisoner has to prove his innocence to a stuffy law professor with the help of a spirited school teacher.

name: The Mortuary Collection
summary_text: An eccentric mortician recounts several macabre and phantasmagorical tales that he's encountered in his distinguished career.

name: Paul, Apostle of Christ
summary_text: Luke travels Roma looking for apostle Paul, turned in Nero's prisoner, to tell his story before his execution.

name: Rosewood
summary_text: A dramatization of a 1923 horrific racist lynch mob attack on an African-American community.

name: Kiss of Death
summary_text: Nick Bianco is caught during a botched jewellery heist. The prosecution offer him a more lenient sentence if he squeals on his accomplices but he doesn't roll over on them. Three years into the sentence an event changes his mind.

name: Kristy
summary_text: When a college girl who is alone on campus over the Thanksgiving break is targeted by a group of outcasts, she must conquer her deepest fears to outwit them and fight back.

name: Alles is liefde
summary_text: The bumpy love lives of four Amsterdam couples intersect during the days leading up to Dutch national holiday Sinterklaas.

name: 2036 Origin Unknown
summary_text: After a failed mission to Mars, A.I./ARTI is now used for the 2036 mission with a few human supervisors. A monolith of unknown origin is found there. It will have a big effect on Earth.

name: He's Out There
summary_text: On vacation at a remote lake house, a mother and her two young daughters must fight for survival after falling into a terrifying and bizarre nightmare conceived by a psychopath.

name: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight
summary_text: A group of technology-dependent teenagers goes to offline camp and faces a deadly danger lurking in the woods.

name: Skin Trade
summary_text: After his family is killed by a Serbian gangster with international interests, NYC detective Nick goes to S.E. Asia and teams up with a Thai detective to get revenge and destroy the syndicates human trafficking network.

name: Young Mr. Lincoln
summary_text: A fictionalized account of the early life of the American president as a young lawyer facing his greatest court case.

name: Equus
summary_text: A psychiatrist attempts to uncover a troubled stable boy's disturbing obsession with horses.

name: Bad Influence
summary_text: A soft and hesitant young man is in danger when tries to break toxic relationships with a mysterious stranger claiming to be his friend.

name: Sextuplets
summary_text: Father-to-be Alan is shocked to learn that he was born a sextuplet. With his newfound brother Russell riding shotgun, the duo sets out on a hilarious journey to reunite with their remaining long-lost siblings.

name: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
summary_text: A young girl is torn between an obsessive lover and a mild-mannered suitor.

name: The Vicious Kind
summary_text: A man tries to warn his brother away from the new girlfriend he brings home during Thanksgiving, but ends up becoming infatuated with her in the process.

name: The Vanished
summary_text: Story of a husband and wife that will stop at nothing to find their missing daughter, who disappeared on a family camping trip. When the police don't catch any leads, the duo take over.

name: The Last Word
summary_text: Harriet is a retired businesswoman who tries to control everything around her. When she decides to write her own obituary, a young journalist takes up the task of finding out the truth resulting in a life-altering friendship.

name: Singham Returns
summary_text: Owing to the wrongdoings affiliated with evils similar to black money, an honest but ferocious police officer returns as the Deputy Commissioner of Police with the prospect of wiping out injustice.

name: Truly Madly Deeply
summary_text: A woman dealing with inconsolable grief over the death of her partner gets another chance when he returns to earth as a ghost.

name: Gadjo dilo
summary_text: A man is looking for a singer he had heard on cassette. He finds much more.

name: Careful What You Wish For
summary_text: A guy gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker. Soon, a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal.

name: The Humanity Bureau
summary_text: A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

name: The Hit
summary_text: Ten years after ratting on his old mobster friends in exchange for personal immunity, two hit men drive a hardened criminal to Paris for his execution. However, while on the way, whatever can go wrong, does go wrong.

name: Killing Ground
summary_text: A couple's camping trip turns into a frightening ordeal when they stumble across the scene of a horrific crime.

name: The Absent Minded Professor
summary_text: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

name: Phoebe in Wonderland
summary_text: Confounded by her clashes with the seemingly rule-obsessed world, a troubled young girl seeks enlightenment from her unconventional drama teacher.

name: Sharknado 4: The 4th Awakens
summary_text: Fin, his family and the cosmos have been blissfully sharknado-free in the five years since the most recent attack, but now sharks and tornadoes are being whipped up in unexpected ways and places.

name: The Electric Horseman
summary_text: A rodeo star past his prime steals his company's horse and rides into the desert, with a feisty reporter accompanying him.

name: The Liability
summary_text: When 19-year-old Adam agrees to do a day's driving for his mum's gangster boyfriend Peter, it takes him on a 24-hour journey into a nightmarish world of murder, sex trafficking and revenge, in the company of aging hit man Roy.

name: Jury Duty
summary_text: Jobless loser Tommy Collins is sequestered to be a juror in a serial killer trial. He does everything he can to prolong the trial and deliberations to take full advantage of the free lodging and food.

name: Babylon 5: In the Beginning
summary_text: Emperor Londo Mollari of the Centauri Republic tells the story of the Earth-Minbari War that almost destroyed humanity and later inspired its last best, hope for peace.

name: Getting Even with Dad
summary_text: A thief's son cons his father into spending more time with him.

name: Astérix et le coup du menhir
summary_text: The druid is accidentally hit by a menhir thrown by Obelix and loses his mind and memory.

name: The Fanatic
summary_text: A rabid film fan stalks his favorite action hero and destroys the star's life.

name: De Dana Dan
summary_text: Two down on their luck men tries to kidnap a wealthy businesswoman's dog to demand a hefty ransom from her. Things goes haywire when the dog goes missing.

name: Somersault
summary_text: A young girl flees her hometown and arrives in the Australian Alps, where new experiences help her learn the differences between sex and love.

name: 1,000 Times Good Night
summary_text: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband refuses to put up with her dangerous life any longer.

name: Mohra
summary_text: A journalist comes to the aid of a murderer with a life sentence when she makes an appeal in court and although he is given his freedom, they soon discover that there is a grim reason behind his release.

name: The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe
summary_text: A hapless orchestra player becomes an unwitting pawn of rival factions within the French secret service after he is chosen as a decoy by being identified as a super secret agent.

name: Submergence
summary_text: James and Danielle meet on vacation and fall in love. She's going to the dark North Atlantic bottom to find life. He's going to Somalia to find a terrorist but gets a dark cell.

name: Await Further Instructions
summary_text: A family's Christmas takes a strange turn when they awake to find themselves trapped inside and begin receiving mysterious instructions through the television.

name: Mister Lonely
summary_text: In Paris, a young American who works as a Michael Jackson look-alike meets Marilyn Monroe, who invites him to her commune in Scotland, where she lives with Charlie Chaplin and her daughter, Shirley Temple.

name: Felicia's Journey
summary_text: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.

name: Guide
summary_text: When mistaken to be a sage by some villagers, an ex-tour guide reflects on his past and lost love to search for spiritual wisdom to guide the villagers.

name: California Dreamin'
summary_text: A railway chief delays a NATO train transporting military equipment during the war in Kosovo in 1999.

name: Cadaver
summary_text: In the starving aftermath of a nuclear disaster, a family of three attends a charitable event at a hotel, which takes a dark turn when people start to disappear.

name: The Garbage Pail Kids Movie
summary_text: Dodger must confront the struggles of life as he is visited by the Garbage Pail Kids and intimidated by some older bullies.

name: Miss Violence
summary_text: An unnerving story about a horrid family drama kept behind closed doors, and an elaborate facade where appearances can be deceiving, and nothing is as it seems.

name: Hypnotisören
summary_text: A detective pairs himself with a famous psychologist on a case involving a traumatized young witness to a crime.

name: Offside
summary_text: Struggle of Women in a country that excludes them from entering the stadiums.

name: Flicka
summary_text: Young Katy claims a wild horse as her own -- an effort to prove to her father that she is capable of taking over the family horse ranch one day.

name: Golmaal 3
summary_text: In Goa, Pritam meets his love Geeta after many years. They decide to get married but the feud between their respective children creates tension in their marriage.

name: Mifunes sidste sang
summary_text: Kresten's dad dies and he returns to the farm on Lolland to take care of things incl. his retarded brother. He employs a hooker as maid. He loses wife and job due to lies. The maid's kid brother moves in and they're a family of 4.

name: The Story of Adele H
summary_text: Adèle Hugo's unrequited love for a lieutenant.

name: Mao's Last Dancer
summary_text: In Maoist China, a boy is taken from his family and trained to become a dancer, but everything he knows is challenged when he is chosen to attend a ballet summer school in Houston, Texas.

name: Griffin & Phoenix
summary_text: Two people face a seemingly insurmountable obstacle that may stand between them and a last chance at love.

name: Love Liza
summary_text: Following the unexplained suicide of his wife Liza, a web designer turns to gasoline fumes and remote-control airplanes while avoiding an inevitable conflict with his mother-in-law.

name: The Sky Is Pink
summary_text: Based on the love story of a couple spanning 25 years and told through the lens of their spunky teenage daughter Aisha Chaudhary, who was diagnosed with pulmonary fibrosis.

name: Neighbors
summary_text: A quiet man's peaceful suburban lifestyle is threatened by the new, obnoxious couple that moves in next door.

name: Blue Collar
summary_text: When three workers try to steal from the local union, they discover the corruption of the union instead and decide to blackmail them.

name: Early Summer
summary_text: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans.

name: Essential Killing
summary_text: An Afghan POW attempts his escape.

name: La casa muda
summary_text: A girl becomes trapped inside a house and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt it.

name: Time Freak
summary_text: A genius teenage boy is in love with a girl who breaks up after a year. He invents a time-machine and tries to fix the break-up repeatedly. He finally goes a year back with his friend/advisor to fix the bad days.

name: The Ballad of Narayama
summary_text: In a poor 19th century rural Japanese village, everyone who reaches the age of 70 has to climb a nearby mountain to die. An old woman is getting close to the cut-off age, and we follow her last days with her family.

name: A King in New York
summary_text: A recently-deposed European monarch seeks shelter in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity and is later wrongly accused of being a Communist.

name: Rocky Handsome
summary_text: A reclusive pawn shop owner sets his sights on revenge when vicious gangsters kidnap his drug-addicted neighbor's young daughter.

name: The High Note
summary_text: A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers.

name: Onegin
summary_text: Russia, 1820s: Onegin inherits his uncle's country estate and moves there from St. Petersburg. He befriends his neighbor, Lensky, and meets Tatyana through him. She falls in love with Onegin but he just wants friendship.

name: Let Sleeping Corpses Lie
summary_text: A cop chases two hippies suspected of a series of Manson family-like murders; unbeknownst to him, the real culprits are the living dead, brought to life with a hunger for human flesh by ultrasonic radiation being used for pest control.

name: Bo Burnham: what.
summary_text: A musical stand-up comedy show by Bo Burnham, the famous internet musician.

name: Let's Scare Jessica to Death
summary_text: A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.

name: Herbie Rides Again
summary_text: The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.

name: Good Deeds
summary_text: Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.

name: Tesis sobre un homicidio
summary_text: Roberto Bermudez, a specialist in criminal law, is convinced that one of his students committed a brutal murder. It leads him to start an investigation that becomes his obsession.

name: Ghost Dad
summary_text: A widowed father tries to support his children after he becomes a ghost in an accident.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
summary_text: A Heffley family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to get to a video gaming convention.

name: The Names of Love
summary_text: A young, extroverted left-wing activist who sleeps with her political opponents to convert them to her cause is successful until she meets her match.

name: Minyeo-neun goerowo
summary_text: A talented but obese girl, who ghost-sings for a not-so-talented pop star, undergoes extensive plastic surgery to become a slender beauty with a new identity.

name: Amsterdamned
summary_text: A hard-boiled police detective sets out to capture a gruesome serial killer terrorizing the canals of Amsterdam.

name: Crossfire
summary_text: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

name: The Brothers McMullen
summary_text: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

name: Bright Lights, Big City
summary_text: A disillusioned young writer living in New York City turns to drugs and drinking to block out the memories of his dead mother and estranged wife.

name: Mutluluk
summary_text: When an unmarried teenage girl is believed by her family to have given up her virginity, she is ordered to be killed out of shame. But before her relative is able to complete the task, the two encounter a college professor.

name: Invasion of the Triffids
summary_text: After an unusual meteor shower leaves most of the human population blind, a merchant navy officer must find a way to conquer tall, aggressive plants which are feeding on people and animals.

name: Arabesk
summary_text: This is the tragicomic story of two lovers who cannot ever get together. Sener is the son of a simple family in the village and he is in love with the village headman's daughter Mujde. Kaya...                See full summary »

name: High Lane
summary_text: A group of friends on vacation decide to venture onto a trail high up in the mountains that has been closed for repairs. The climb proves more perilous than planned, especially as they soon...                See full summary »

name: City of Lies
summary_text: Russell Poole and Jack Jackson investigate the murders of rappers Notorious B.I.G. and Tupac Shakur.

name: Frontera
summary_text: A former Arizona sheriff's wife is killed while riding on their ranch property. It would appear a Mexican man illegally crossing into the US is at fault. As the former and the current sheriff search for answers, lives are changed forever.

name: The Decline
summary_text: A fatal accident at a remote survivalist training camp sends participants into a panic - and sets the stage for a chilling showdown.

name: Little Odessa
summary_text: Early 1990s drama about a family of Soviet Jews living in Brooklyn's Brighton Beach ocean-side neighborhood nicknamed Little Odessa.

name: Neighboring Sounds
summary_text: The lives of the residents of a Brazilian apartment building and the security guards who get the job guarding the surrounding streets.

name: Earth
summary_text: It's 1947 and the borderlines between India and Pakistan are being drawn. A young girl witnesses tragedy as her ayah (nanny) is caught between the love of two men and the rising tide of political and religious violence.

name: Summer
summary_text: It's July, and Delphine has nowhere to go for the summer. She feels very bored and "empty", but this won't last; one day she accidently meets someone who seems to be totally made for her...

name: Metropia
summary_text: A complex story of a misaligned man, though good intent, creating a nightmarish Dystopian existence.

name: The Woman Next Door
summary_text: Two ex-lovers wind up living next door to each other with their respective spouses. Forbidden passions ensue.

name: The Tempest
summary_text: Shakespeare's epic play is translated from page to screen, with the gender of the main character, Prospero, changed from male to female.

name: Death Rides a Horse
summary_text: A young gunfighter forms a tenuous alliance with an aging ex-outlaw to track down and eliminate the bandits who killed his family, till the surprising end.

name: Still Life
summary_text: A council case worker looks for the relatives of those found dead and alone.

name: Southside with You
summary_text: Chronicles the 1989 summer afternoon when the future President of the United States, Barack Obama, wooed his future First Lady, Michelle Obama, on a first date across Chicago's South Side.

name: Zombieland
summary_text: Four survivors are killin' zombies and searching for a place to call home. At least they have each other.

name: The Legend
summary_text: This Hong Kong martial-arts extravaganza tells of evil emperors and true love. The secret Red Lotus Flower Society is committed to the overthrow of the evil Manchu Emperor and his minions. ...                See full summary »

name: Detective Story
summary_text: On one day in the 21st Precinct squad room, assorted characters form a backdrop for the troubles of hard-nosed Detective Jim McLeod.

name: Yellowbeard
summary_text: After serving two decades in prison, Yellowbeard (Graham Chapman) breaks out determined to recover the treasure that he buried so long ago, alongside his son, old crew, and the British Navy.

name: 4 mosche di velluto grigio
summary_text: A musician is stalked by an unknown homicidal maniac, who blackmails him for the accidental killing of another stalker.

name: Endless Love
summary_text: A high-school student's love for a 15-year-old girl is thwarted by parental disapproval, circumstance, and accident; he burns down her family's house and is committed to a psychiatric hospital.

name: Love Per Square Foot
summary_text: Individually, Sanjay and Karina don't earn enough to be able to buy a home, so they enter into a marriage of convenience.

name: Matewan
summary_text: A labor union organizer comes to an embattled mining community brutally and violently dominated and harassed by the mining company.

name: Fandango
summary_text: Five college buddies from the University of Texas circa 1971 embark on a final road trip odyssey across the Mexican border before facing up to uncertain futures, in Vietnam and otherwise.

name: Camille
summary_text: A Parisian courtesan must choose between the young man who loves her and the callous baron who wants her, even as her own health begins to fail.

name: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
summary_text: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

name: Le Notti Bianche
summary_text: A humble clerk courts a woman who night after night awaits for the return of her lover.

name: Somebody Up There Likes Me
summary_text: Boxer Rocky Graziano's biopic, based on his autobiography, from childhood to his World Middleweight Championship title win at age 28 in 1947.

name: Outrageous Fortune
summary_text: Two women unknowingly share the same man, but when he disappears, both go out looking for him and enter his surprisingly dangerous life.

name: Sällskapsresan eller Finns det svenskt kaffe på grisfesten
summary_text: Swedes travel to the Canary Islands on a package trip.

name: Vexille
summary_text: Japan, 2077: A female agent named Vexille is dispatched to Tokyo to investigate whether Japanese are developing robotic technology, which has been banned by the U.N. due to its potential threat to humankind.

name: Socha Na Tha
summary_text: A boy is forced meet a girl for an arranged marriage but even though he refuses the match, they secretly become friends. As things get complicated and both get engaged to different people they realize they've fallen in love with each other.

name: Prince of the City
summary_text: A New York City narcotics detective reluctantly agrees to cooperate with a special commission investigating police corruption, and soon realises he's in over his head, and nobody can be trusted.

name: The Spirit of St. Louis
summary_text: Charles 'Slim' Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will make his New York to Paris flight the first solo transatlantic crossing.

name: Vatel
summary_text: Vatel is the cook of Prince Condé. When the prince invites Louis XIV to hunt, he has to give lavish banquets in order to fall in his favor. But when Vatel falls in love with the king's mistress, love and duty come into conflict.

name: Dragons Forever
summary_text: Three successful Hong Kong lawyers are hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when their employer's motives become clear.

name: The Winslow Boy
summary_text: Following the theft of a postal-order, a fourteen-year old cadet is expelled from Naval College. To save the honour of the boy and his family, the pre-eminent barrister of the day is engaged to take on the might the Admiralty.

name: Gold Diggers of 1933
summary_text: A wealthy composer rescues unemployed Broadway performers with a new play.

name: Take Me Home
summary_text: Soon after Thom starts operating as an illegal taxi driver in New York City, Claire hires him to drive her to California after her estranged father suffers a heart attack.

name: Alibi.com
summary_text: Greg and co. provide alibis for infidelities etc. He falls in love with Flo, whose dad turns out to be his customer.

name: Educazione siberiana
summary_text: A drama based on a memoir about growing up as a member of the Urka community in the small republic of Transnistria.

name: Dad's Army
summary_text: The Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard platoon deal with a visiting female journalist and a German spy as World War II draws to its conclusion.

name: The Young Lions
summary_text: WW2 drama that follows the lives of three young men, one German and two Americans, during wartime.

name: Twitches
summary_text: Two teen witches who were separated at birth and were adopted by two different families meet on their 21st birthday and must use their powers to save the world in which they were born, where their birth mother still lives.

name: Spiral
summary_text: The inhabitants of a small Japanese town become increasingly obsessed with and tormented by spirals.

name: Obsluhoval jsem anglického krále
summary_text: A look at the glamorous life at an old-world Prague hotel.

name: The Nile Hilton Incident
summary_text: A maid witnesses a murder at an upscale hotel and a policeman is assigned to the case, but it soon becomes clear that important people don't want the case solved.

name: Beynelmilel
summary_text: It is 80's Turkey, local musicians of Adiyaman are hired by the military and trained to welcome one of the forceful generals of coup regime.

name: Mughal-E-Azam
summary_text: A 16th century prince falls in love with a court dancer and battles with his emperor father.

name: Manorama: Six Feet Under
summary_text: Satyaveer accepts money from Manorama, wife of an irrigation minister, to collect evidence against her husband for having an extra-marital affair. He accepts, unaware that he too is being deceived.

name: She Hate Me
summary_text: Fired from his job for exposing corrupt business practices, a former biotech executive turns to impregnating wealthy lesbians for profit.

name: Treasure Island
summary_text: The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate captain Long John Silver.

name: True Confessions
summary_text: A worldly ambitious monsignor clashes with his older brother, a cynical Los Angeles homicide detective who is investigating the brutal murder of a young prostitute.

name: The Tingler
summary_text: An obsessed pathologist discovers and captures a parasitic creature that grows when fear grips its host.

name: The Taming of the Shrew
summary_text: Brutish, fortune-hunting scoundrel Petruchio tames his wealthy, shrewish wife, Katharina.

name: Citizen Ruth
summary_text: An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides.

name: Goat
summary_text: Reeling from a terrifying assault, a 19 year-old enrolls into college with his brother and pledges the same fraternity. What happens there in the name of "brotherhood" tests him and his loyalty to his brother in brutal ways.

name: Trouble Every Day
summary_text: Two American newlyweds in Paris experience a love so strong, it almost devours them.

name: Someone Marry Barry
summary_text: Three friends plot to get rid of their socially inappropriate friend by finding him a wife, but when he meets a woman just like him, their problems double.

name: The Tortured
summary_text: An upper-middle-class couple's life is destroyed when their only child is kidnapped and killed. Obsessed with revenge, the couple seizes an opportunity to kidnap the killer.

name: Landscape in the Mist
summary_text: Two children journey the long road to Germany to find the man they believe to be their father.

name: Don't Let Go
summary_text: After a man's family dies in what appears to be a murder, he gets a phone call from one of the dead, his niece. He's not sure if she's a ghost or if he's going mad, but as it turns out, he's not.

name: The Legacy of the Bones
summary_text: Inspector Amaia Salazar returns to the Baztán's valley for a new case. And this time even the most beloved for her will not be safe.

name: The Unforgiven
summary_text: The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

name: Loverboy
summary_text: Randy is still unfocused after 2 years in college. His dad will no longer pay tuition and Randy gets a job delivering pizzas. Several cute cougars pay him $200 for pizza delivery and "services rendered". Their husbands?

name: Pee-wee's Big Holiday
summary_text: A fateful meeting with a mysterious stranger inspires Pee-wee Herman to take his first holiday ever in this epic story of friendship and destiny.

name: Love Letter
summary_text: When exchanging letters two women discover new things about a man they knew.

name: Jem and the Holograms
summary_text: As a small-town girl catapults from underground video sensation to global superstar, she and her three sisters begin a journey of discovering that some talents are too special to keep hidden.

name: Teo-neol
summary_text: A man is on his way home when the poorly constructed tunnel he is driving through collapses, leaving him trapped.

name: Easy Money II: Hard to Kill
summary_text: Three years later, JW gets out of prison, but soon finds himself between the contending parties of his criminal past.

name: The Killers
summary_text: Surprised that their contract victim didn't try to run away from them, two professional hit men try to find out who hired them and why.

name: The Body
summary_text: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.

name: In My Father's Den
summary_text: A disillusioned war journalist's return home is blighted when he becomes implicated in the mysterious disappearance of a teenage girl he has befriended.

name: The Unknown
summary_text: A criminal on the run hides in a circus and seeks to possess the daughter of the ringmaster at any cost.

name: Let Them All Talk
summary_text: A famous author goes on a cruise trip with her friends and nephew in an effort to find fun and happiness while she comes to terms with her troubled past.

name: Learning to Drive
summary_text: As her marriage dissolves, a Manhattan writer takes driving lessons from a Sikh instructor with marriage troubles of his own. In each other's company they find the courage to get back on the road and the strength to take the wheel.

name: A Princess for Christmas
summary_text: At the invitation of an estranged relative, a young woman travels with her niece and nephew to a castle in Europe for Christmas, where she unwittingly falls for a dashing Prince.

name: The Man Who Saved the World
summary_text: Two space cadets crash-land on a desert planet, where an evil wizard seeks the ultimate power to take over the world. Although the movie borrows some background footage from Star Wars, the plot is mostly unrelated.

name: The Promise
summary_text: Roger uses his son Igor to ruthlessly traffic and exploit undocumented immigrants. When one of the immigrants is killed, Igor is guilt-ridden and wants to care for the dead man's family against his father's orders.

name: The Beautiful Troublemaker
summary_text: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

name: They Live by Night
summary_text: An escaped convict, injured during a robbery, falls in love with the woman who nurses him back to health, but their relationship seems doomed from the beginning.

name: Saawariya
summary_text: Two souls arrive in a small town, one on vacation, the other to meet a lover. They spend the most magical dream-like days of their lives in that town... with each other.

name: Il bisbetico domato
summary_text: A grouchy farmer, known around his small Italian town as being wonderful to his employees, but actively driving everyone else away, is in for a surprise when a beautiful girl from the city,...                See full summary »

name: Fun and Fancy Free
summary_text: Jiminy Cricket hosts two Disney animated shorts: "Bongo," about a circus bear escaping to the wild, and "Mickey and the Beanstalk," a take on the famous fairy tale.

name: High School
summary_text: A high school valedictorian who gets baked with the local stoner finds himself the subject of a drug test. The situation causes him to concoct an ambitious plan to get his entire graduating class to face the same fate, and fail.

name: Book of Blood
summary_text: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.

name: Circumstance
summary_text: A wealthy Iranian family struggles to contain a teenager's growing sexual rebellion and her brother's dangerous obsession.

name: The Great Ziegfeld
summary_text: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

name: A Vigilante
summary_text: After escaping her violent husband, Sadie makes it her life's mission to help free others in danger. After months of rigorous training in survival skills, boxing, and lethal martial arts, she is back with a vengeance.

name: 7 Days
summary_text: A doctor seeks revenge by kidnapping, torturing and killing the man who raped and murdered his young daughter.

name: The Tao of Steve
summary_text: Underachieving, overweight kindergarten teacher Dex finds a woman who forces him to reexamine his Zen-like system of seduction.

name: Bad Blood
summary_text: As a deadly virus which infects people who have loveless sex sweeps Paris, a lonely pariah attempts to steal a potent antidote, only to fall for the mistress of his partner-in-crime. Is the infectious young love the cure to the bad blood?

name: Head Above Water
summary_text: A prominent judge, his wife, her ex-lover, and their neighbor encounter a dead body that complicates their lives.

name: Secuestrados
summary_text: Three hooded Eastern-European criminals burst into a home in a Madrid gated community, holding the family hostage in its own home, and forcing the father to empty his credit cards.

name: I Am David
summary_text: A twelve-year-old boy escapes from a Bulgarian Communist concentration camp and sets out on a journey to reach Denmark.

name: The Suicide Shop
summary_text: A family-run shop that sells everything you need to take your own life finds it hard to focus on business after a new baby -- one who makes everyone around him happy -- is born into the family.

name: A Raisin in the Sun
summary_text: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

name: The Cheetah Girls
summary_text: Four teens aim to take the world by storm with their music.

name: Kukushka
summary_text: In WWII, a Finnish sniper is left chained to a rock by German soldiers, while a captain of the Red Army, en route to his court martial, is almost blown up by Russian planes. A Lapp woman gives a shelter to both of them at her farm.

name: Floating Weeds
summary_text: The head of a Japanese theatre troupe returns to a small coastal town where he left a son who thinks he is his uncle, and tries to make up for the lost time, but his current mistress grows jealous.

name: Nightmare Alley
summary_text: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

name: The Veil
summary_text: Twenty-five years after members of a religious cult committed mass suicide, the lone survivor returns to the scene of the tragedy with a documentary crew in tow.

name: Summer of '42
summary_text: During his summer vacation on Nantucket Island in 1942, a youth eagerly awaiting his first sexual encounter finds himself developing an innocent love for a young woman awaiting news on her soldier husband's fate in WWII.
